name: preprocess_drug.txt
description: Utility functions for preprocessing drug SMILES data, including molecular fingerprinting, pretrained model embedding, molecule graph construction, and other methods such as one-hot encoding for CNNs.

name: preprocess_protein.txt
description: Utility functions for preprocessing protein sequence data, including fingerprinting, pretrained model embedding, and other methods such as one-hot encoding for CNNs. Functions for processing protein structures are not included.
